full_text: The Israeli Declaration of Independence , formally the Declaration of the Establishment of the State of Israel, was proclaimed on 14 May 1948  by David Ben-Gurion, the Executive Head of the World Zionist Organization and the chairman of the Jewish Agency for Palestine. It declared the establishment of a Jewish state in Eretz-Israel, to be known as the State of Israel, which would come into effect on termination of the British Mandate at midnight that day. The event is celebrated annually in Israel with a national holiday Yom Ha'atzmaut  on 5 Iyar of every year according to the Hebrew calendar.
title: Israeli Declaration of Independence
